column5: Well I read through just about every review prior to purchasing this phone
and was almost thinking twice about it
after reading some of the reviews here ,
but I decided to take the plunge
All I can say is this phone
The question is whether you ` re going go flip out over an alarm clock or volume strip or is it a trivial issue for you .
Most of the gripes others have had just seem little to me .
Let 's talk about the pros and cons :
My area has good T-mobile coverage
It also pairs with my bluetooth headset
Speaker phone is of good quality too .
and yes EDGE is n't the fastest
where I 'm at I can check my email ,
finds restaurants or directions , or just surf the web
when I was out on vacation
Did n't want to fork out the money for hotspots though .
3 . The camera at 1.3 megapixels is decent quality .
No it 's not going to replace my regular camera
but I found it really handy
when I forgot to take my camera to my friend 's wedding ,
but was still able to take quality pictures .
I have n't tried videos yet though .
Now the speakers on this phone are n't the greatest so I would n't use them for listening to music
but when plugged into a headset
a 2GB microSD card bought here at Amazon
and now I can hold a ton music and movies .
This thing is my travelinig entertainment center .
I even found a way to play original nintendo games on this thing
and have been trying Mike Tyson 's Punchout like back in the old days .
I 'm more compelled to actually use my calendar
and keep my schedule on this thing
than I did with my Pocket PC .
and I keep all my medical applications on this phone .
I can quickly look up drug references or research diseases .
I really thought I 'd need a touchscreen
in order to better navigate these programs
and while it might be slightly easier with a stylus ,
I do n't find that it 's all that
I just wish the processor were slightly faster for some of these apps ,
there are a lot of programs for the smartphone .
Programs written for WM5 are compatable with PPC as well as smartphones equally .
Everyone who sees this phone absolutely loves its looks
I saw this side by side with the Motorola Q
and the Q just looked so much bulkier and . . . well . . . not
for it makes it through the day with plenty battery to spare
I would n't go 2 days without charging the battery though .
You should charge it every night .
Mighty Microsoft needs to write a cleaner program .
However Windows Mobile 6 is on the way
and will be free to download for T-Mobile customer soon
so hopefully that ` ll take care of some of the problems .
I swear just to turn on the bluetooth
and pair up my bluetooth device
takes me a whole minute just because of how hard it is to navigate WM5 .
Adjusting the volume with this thing is tedious at best .
Luckily my music\/video programs as well as my stereo headset allow
me easier ways to adjust the volume
so it 's not such an issue for me .
Now I do n't use this all that much
but I see what everyone says
and yeah it 's a pretty idiotic written program .
However rather than writing half a page on how bad it is I downloaded a free one from the internet
so my life now goes on .
So I use this device to make quality phone calls , surf the web , check email , play games , listen to music , watch movies , monitor my schedule , check my medical references ,
and it 'd be the greatest gadget
